name: Auth-Cognito-Service
description: This project contains source code and supporting files for a serverless application that you can deploy with the SAM CLI. It includes the following files and folders.

scripts.sam-build: cd verify-auth-challenge && tsc && cd .. && cd pre-sign-up && tsc && cd .. && cd define-auth-challenge && tsc && cd .. && cd create-auth-challenge && tsc && cd .. && sam build -u --parallel
scripts.sam-build-deploy: npm run sam-build && npm run sam-deploy
